subject: Fantasy Sports
Gambling
Computers and the Internet
Football
lead_paragraph: Although companies can counter proxy servers, which mask a computer’s location, The Times was recently able to make bets on DraftKings from the six states where daily fantasy sports is considered illegal.
snippet: Although companies can counter proxy servers, which mask a computer’s location, The Times was recently able to make bets on DraftKings from the six states where daily fantasy sports is considered illegal.
